general.title: Melbourne Central Station Closed
general.body:
Melbourne Central station is currently closed due to a water leak.

We are currently working to restore access to the station.

Passengers wanting to travel to/from the Melbourne Central area may use either Flagstaff or Parliament stations or access other stations via Yarra Trams services.

outages.name: Southern Cross Platforms 13/14
outages.title: No lift access between Bourke Street concourse and platforms 13/14
outages.description:
There is currently no lift access between Bourke Street concourse and Platforms 13/14.

Lift access is still available between the Collins Street concourse and Platforms 13/14.

Passengers requiring additional assistance can contact Travellers Aid at Southern Cross station on 9670 2072 between 6:30am and 9:30pm, 7 days a week.
